name: Hair removal cream
title: Veet Pure · Hair removal cream · Face

cosmeticInformation.ingredients: Haarentfernungs-Creme: Aqua, Urea, Paranum Liquidum, Cetearyl Alcohol, Potassium Thioglycolate, Calcium Hydroxide, Talc, Ceteareth-20, Glycerin, Sorbitol, Magnesium Trisilicate, Parfum, Propylene Glycol, Lithium Magnesium Sodium Silicate, Sodium Gluconate, Vitis Vinifera Seed Oil, Acrylates Copolymer, Tocopherol, CI 77891.Sanft pflegende Gesichtscreme:Aqua, Butylene Glycol, Dimethicone, Octyldodecanol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Polysorbate 60, Sorbitan Isostearate, Bisabolol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Parfum, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Propylene Glycol , Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Citric Acid, Limonene, Citronellol, Sodium Hydroxide, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, CI 77891

usageInformation.usage: 1.spread the cream evenly over the area to be depilated so that all hairs are covered.2.leave the cream to work for 3 minutes. Then test with a cotton pad on a small area whether the hairs can already be removed. If the hair comes off easily, remove the rest of the cream with a cotton pad. If the hair does not come off, leave the cream on for a little longer - but no longer than 6 minutes in total.3. To remove the cream completely, rinse the skin thoroughly with water and dry it.4. Use the gently nourishing face cream like a moisturiser and massage it gently into the skin.
usageInformation.additionalInformation: Does the visible hair on your upper lip and face bother you? Then we recommend our depilatory cream, specially adapted for use on the face, developed for sensitive skin and dermatologically tested. Its refined formula, containing as few ingredients as possible, provides a silky smooth sensation. With no ammonia odour**, its fragrance is surprisingly pleasant. What's more, by using our cream, you can keep the razor and any cuts away from your sensitive face. *With the lowest number of ingredients of any previous Veet cream. **The responsible ingredient has been removed.

remarks.value: Bewahren Sie diese Packung auf, da Sie dieaufgedruckten Informationen benötigen werden.
